TopicTitle: What would you do if you crash landed on kerbin and you are from a NASA mission?

Articles.Content:
What would you do if you crash landed on kerbin?

I give full credit to Apollo1391 for Inspiring me to make this thread.

(How I was inspired: I read his thread.)

If I did I bet the first think the kerbals would say is: We're all expert at what you just did.

if I landed on kerbin I would probably cover myself in grass and try to blend in and act like them until I get rescued and then reveal I was an alien when I am about to leave. I think it would actually be pretty cool living among the kerbals!
"Uh, Houston... what the hell were you thinking?!"
Shoot down the incoming SRBs from Jeb.
Disable my distress beacon because I would be in Spaceflight Heaven! To the Mun then Duna then out to Jool and all before lunch. Heaven, pure heaven.

I would do the random win dance

and then I would try to communicate with the kerbals and invent the parachute for them then I would get in orbit and try to forge an alliance,

and then take over earth
Wonder how there's grass, some buildings and nothing else.

Hope that I have an English-Spanish translator on board, along with a voice recorder with a reverse function, to communicate.

After that, teach the Kerbals about the Sol System, and how similar it is to the Kerbol system.

Then send Mission Control pictures of the Kerbals, and hope I'm not a test subject in one of their ships.
